description.en:
"Please don’t touch the guy wearing glasses…"
Department head Kim, who quit his job as a special agent only for his daughter Minji and chose to be normal. Then one day, Minji disappeared silently, and Manager Kim began to find his daughter by turning the country that monitors him into the enemy.
description.ko:
제발 안경 쓴 아저씨는 건들지 말자.
오직 자신의 딸 '민지'를 위해 특수요원직을 관두고 평범함을 선택한 가장 김부장.
그러던 어느 날 민지가 소리소문 없이 사라지고, 김부장은 자신을 감시하는 국가를 적으로 돌리면서까지 딸을 찾아나서기 시작하는데...
[외모지상주의], [싸움독학] 그리고 [인생존망]을 잇는 박태준 유니버스의 공식 스핀오프 작품!
description.ru:
Пожалуйста, не трогайте мужчину в очках.
Менеджер Ким, глава семьи, который бросил работу специализированного агента и выбрал простую жизнь ради своей дочери Мин Джи.
Однажды в один прекрасный день Мин Джи исчезает, не говорив ни слова , и менеджер Ким начинает искать свою дочь, постепенно превращая страну, которая следит за ним, во врага...
description.pt-br: Pai solteiro, gerente de companhia e ex membro das forças especiais. O Sr. Kim vivia uma vida normal até sua filha, Minji, desaparecer. Depois de descobrir que ela poderia estar morta, o Sr. Kim parte em uma busca implacável por informações. Ele irá resgatar Minji a qualquer custo, mesmo que isso signifique destruir tudo e todos que cruzarem seu caminho.

title.en: Kanojo ni Naritai Kimi to Boku

altTitles.en: The Woman You Are and Me
The you who wants to be a woman and I

altTitles.ja: カノジョになりたい君と僕

description.en: Hime Sakuragaike has secretly been in love with her childhood friend Akira Yonezawa since they were kids, but Hime only recently found out that Akira identifies as female. Although surprised, Hime offers her full support, and this is initially kept secret between them for a few years, but Akira decides to start living as a girl full-time upon starting high school with Hime. However, since Akira garners a certain amount of attention, Hime takes it upon herself to aggressively stick up for Akira whenever necessary. Not wanting Akira to be singled out as an object of ridicule, Hime decides that her only option is to put herself in Akira's shoes.

title.en: The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

altTitles.zh: 反派大师兄，师妹们全是病娇

altTitles.zh-ro: Fǎnpài Dà Shīxiōng, Shīmèimen Quán Shì Bìng Jiāo
Fanpai Da Shixiong, Shimeimen Quan Shi Bing Jiao

altTitles.en: The Big Villain Brother and the Junior Sisters Are All Sick and Delicate
The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

altTitles.es-la: El Gran Villano Hermano Mayor y todas sus Hermanas Menores Yandere

altTitles.vi: Nhân Vật Phản Diện Đại Sư Huynh, Tất Cả Các Sư Muội Đều Là Bệnh Kiều
Nhân Vật Phản Diện Đại Sư Huynh, Tất Cả Các Sư Muội Đều Là Yandere

altTitles.uk: Старший брат-наставник - лиходій, а молодші сестри-наставниці ціловито божевільні

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.

title.en: A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal~〈Fan Colored〉

altTitles.ja: 男女比1:39の平行世界は思いのほか普通

altTitles.ja-ro: Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu

description.en: Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

Park Hyung-Seok is an unattractive loner who wakes up in a different body. Now tall, handsome, and cooler than ever in his new form, Hyung-Seok aims to achieve everything he couldn't before.

How far will he go to keep his body... and his secrets?
description.pt: Em uma sociedade onde aparência significa tudo, Park Hyumg Suk, pequeno, gordo e não atraente, sofre bullying diariamente, mas nunca falou a sua mãe super trabalhadeira sobre isso. Um dia, quando sua mãe o vê sofrendo bullying, ela o envia para uma escola melhor. Mas infelizmente, ele descobre que sua nova escola é tão cruel quanto a anterior. Uma noite, ele acorda e descobre que de repente ficou alto, forte e incrivelmente bonito. Quando volta para a cama e encontra o seu corpo antigo corpo dormindo. Ele agora tem uma mente e dois corpos. Toda vez que um dorme, o outro corpo acorda, e toda vez que um acorda o outro dorme. Com medo de sofrer bullying novamente na nova escola, ele decide usar o seu novo corpo para ir à escola. Mas como será isso? Será que ele finalmente será aceito?
description.pt-br: Em uma sociedade onde aparência significa tudo, Park Hyumg Suk, pequeno, gordo e não atraente, sofre bullying diariamente, mas nunca falou a sua mãe super trabalhadeira sobre isso. Um dia, quando sua mãe o vê sofrendo bullying, ela o envia para uma escola melhor. Mas infelizmente, ele descobre que sua nova escola é tão cruel quanto a anterior. Uma noite, ele acorda e descobre que de repente ficou alto, forte e incrivelmente bonito. Quando volta para a cama e encontra o seu corpo antigo corpo dormindo. Ele agora tem uma mente e dois corpos. Toda vez que um dorme, o outro corpo acorda, e toda vez que um acorda o outro dorme. Com medo de sofrer bullying novamente na nova escola, ele decide usar o seu novo corpo para ir à escola. Mas como será isso? Será que ele finalmente será aceito?

title.en: The Fragrant Flower Blooms with Dignity

altTitles.ja: 薫る花は凛と咲く

altTitles.es-la: La fragante flor florece con dignidad

altTitles.pl: Kaoru i Rin. Rozkwitając z tobą

altTitles.th: ดอกรักผลิบานที่กลางใจ

altTitles.vi: Những đóa hoa thơm nở diễm kiều

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.fr:
Bien qu'ils soient mitoyens, le lycée public Chidori pour garçons et le prestigieux lycée privé pour filles Kikyō continuent à entretenir leur tradition de se haïr mutuellement au plus haut point. Tsumugi Rintarō pensait la même chose, jusqu'à ce qu'il fasse la rencontre de Wakuri Kaoruko, élève de Chidori et habituée de la pâtisserie tenue par ses parents. Malgré la désapprobation et les préjugés de leurs camarades respectifs, Rintarō et Kaoruko vont petit à petit se rapprocher, et tant pis ce qu'en pensent les autres !

___
**Liens :**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.ja:
とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。そこに通う紬 凛太郎と、和栗薫子が出会い…。
“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.vi: Ở một nơi nào đó, có 2 trường cao trung lân cận. Cao trung Chidori, một trường nam sinh cấp thấp hội tụ đủ những thằng đần, trường nữ sinh Kikyo, một trường nữ sinh danh giá . Rintaro Tsugumi, một nam sinh năm 2 to khỏe và trầm tính tại trường Chidori, bắt gặp Kaoruko Waguri, một khách hàng khi cậu đang giúp việc tại cửa hàng bánh nhà mình . Rintaro cảm thấy thoải mái khi dành thời gian bên Kaoruko, nhưng cô lại là học sinh của trường Kikyo, ngôi trường hàng xóm cực kì căm ghét trường Chidori. Đây là câu chuyện về 2 con người ở rất gần nhưng lại rất xa
description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

altTitles.ja: 和歌ちゃんは今日もあざとい

altTitles.en: A Hidden Side to my Crush

altTitles.pt-br: O lado oculto da minha Crush

description.en: Tomoya is a college freshman on a mission to finally get his first ever girlfriend, but with one small problem: he's still a virgin! While he's gotten close with the beautiful and charming girl Waka Sakuraba in his club at school, he can't wrack up the courage to take the first step and ask her out. One day, Tomoya stumbles upon a hidden side to his crush Waka...
description.ja:
彼女を作ろうと意気込むDT（童貞）な大学１年生・友哉。同じサークルの癒やし系美少女・桜庭和歌と親しくなるものの、勇気が出ずなかなか第一歩を踏み出せずにいた。
そんなある日、友哉は和歌の「別の一面」を目撃してしまい…？

altTitles.ja: カウンタック

description.en:
The day after he finds himself dumped by his girlfriend, Sorayama Shun receives a letter… from himself? It was written 25 years before for his future self. 
That letter reminds him of the time when he dreamed of owning a Countach and being a successful professional racer. 
With loads of luck and his ambition to make his childhood dream come true, he finds himself as a new owner of an LP400 Countach.

title.en: It's Over! Empress' Husband Is Actually Invincible

altTitles.zh: 完了啊！女帝的软饭丈夫居然无敌

altTitles.zh-ro: Wanliao Ah! Nvdi De Ruan Fan Zhangfu Juran Wudi

description.en: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

altTitles.pt-br: As Regras De Um Bom Garoto

description.en:
Dead Mansion, a Russian private orphanage, trains children to become agents.

The legend of Dead Mansion, codename Sean, which was thought to have been lost due to a "shipping error", has appeared in Korea...?
description.ko:
어린아이들을 요원으로 양성하는 러시아 사설 보육원 '데드멘션'.

그리고 오배송으로 잃어버린 줄 알았던 데드멘션의 전설 '코드네임.
description.pt-br: Um orfanato particular na Rússia chamado “Mansão da Morte” treina crianças pequenas para se tornarem agentes. Essa é uma história que se passa no mesmo universo de Lookism.

altTitles.ja: ピープ

description.en: The popular gal who was my childhood friend is secretly uploading provocative selfies!? In his quest to uncover the secret of this popular girl, high school boy Riku discovers that his own deeply hidden emotions were being observed by someone else… A sweet yet suffocatingly intense blend of youth, love, and suspense.
description.ja: 幼なじみの人気ギャルは、過激な自撮りをアップする裏アカ女子！？人気者の秘密を探ろうとする男子高校生・陸は、逆に自分の隠していた心の底を、別の誰かに覗かれていたことを知る‥‥。溺れるほどに甘く、息もできないほど苦しい、青春×愛憎サスペンス。
description.es-la:
¿La chica popular que era mi amiga de la infancia está subiendo en secreto provocativos selfies de cosplay?
En su búsqueda por descubrir el secreto de esta chica popular, el chico de instituto Riku descubre que sus propias emociones, profundamente ocultas, estaban siendo observadas por otra persona...

Una dulce pero asfixiante mezcla de juventud, amor y suspenso.

description.en: First-year Gilsu Lee transfers schools to run from the bullying and violence. And the new place seems almost perfect. Everyone in his class is friendly and kind, and no one is bullying anybody. Violence? No, we don’t do anything like that in this school. That’s what the “Arena” is for. Don’t forget, Gilsu. What happens in the ring stays in the ring!

altTitles.ja: 魔族のペットになりまして

description.en: One day, Takafumi Ayanokoji, an ordinary high school boy, is warned by a suspicious fortune teller that he is in trouble with women. Immediately after that, along with heavy rain and lightning, a beautiful girl with blonde hair and red eyes appeared. The girl follows Takafumi to his house and says she wants to keep him as a pet, but...!?
description.ja:
普通の高校生が魔族の女の子と恋に落ちる（？）、ちょっぴり刺激的なファンタスティック・ラブコメディ！

普通の男子高校生・綾小路貴文は、ある日、怪しい占い師に『女難の相』が出ていると警告される。 その直後、豪雨と落雷と共に金髪赤眼の美少女が現れた。 少女は貴文の家までついてきて、貴文をペットにしたいと言うのだが――！？
description.es-la: Una comedia romántica fantástica y ligeramente estimulante en la que un estudiante de preparatoria común se enamora (?) de una chica demonio. Un día, el estudiante de preparatoria común, Takafumi, es advertido por un sospechoso adivino de que tiene una "señal de problemas con las mujeres". Inmediatamente después, una hermosa rubia de ojos rojos aparece junto con una fuerte lluvia y un rayo. La chica sigue a Takafumi hasta su casa y dice que quiere mantenerlo como su mascota, pero... ¡¿!?

altTitles.ja: みにくい遊郭の子

altTitles.en: Ugly Duckling of the Entertainment District

altTitles.vi: Cô nàng xấu xí ở Phố Đèn Đỏ

description.en:
An abandoned high school girl becomes an Oiran in a strange world—

Esora, a high school girl who lost her place, found herself in an unknown red light district. She was sold to a slave buyer at the Yukaku "Sagamiya". The owner, Sagami, told her that Ishe could be the number one Oiran there.
description.ja: 居場所を失った女子高生エソラは、気がつくと知らない花街にいた。人買いに売られやってきたのは、遊郭「相模屋」。その主人である相模に、ここで1番の花魁になれると言われ―。幻想的な世界観で描かれる異世界花魁物語。
description.vi:
Một nữ sinh trung học bị bỏ rơi trở thành Oiran (kỹ nữ cao cấp) ở một thế giới xa lạ—
Esora, một nữ sinh trung học bị mất chỗ ở, thấy mình đang ở một khu đèn đỏ vô danh. Cô bị bán cho một người mua nô lệ ở Phố đèn đỏ "Sagamiya". Người chủ, Sagami, nói với cô rằng nếu cô trở thành Oiran thì sẽ có thể làm lại cuộc đời.

altTitles.ja: 雷雷雷

description.en: Fifty years after the war with the aliens... danger emerges... from within a young girl! Ichigaya Sumire, age 18, works at a "space pest" extermination company to pay off the debts her father left behind. But one day, her life is turned upside down when she's abducted by a UFO!
description.ja:
ガール・ミーツ・エイリアン！

エイリアンと戦争から50年――

市ヶ谷スミレ、18歳。父親の残した借金返済のため宇宙害蟲駆除会社に勤務する日々。そんなスミレの日常が、UFOにさらわれたことで一変する…！頭の中で聞こえる何者かの声…襲いかかる宇宙害獣…さらには軍事企業からも狙われて――！？

title.en: I Was Immediately Mistaken for a Monster Genius Actor

altTitles.pt-br: Eu fui confundido como um ator gênio monstro

description.en:
One day, Kang Woo-jin suddenly gains the ability to enter a subspace when he reads a script or scenario, and to become the character himself through the subspace. 

And then, at an audition location where he followed his friend, he happened to show the acting he experienced through the subspace…?
description.ko:
평범한 소시민 강우진에게 어느 날 갑자기대본이나 시나리오를 보면 아공간에 들어갈 수 있고,아공간을 통해 배역 자체가 될 수 있는 능력이 생긴다.

그리고 친구를 따라간 오디션 장소에서우연히 아공간을 통해 경험한 연기를 보여주게 되었는데…?

description.en: The number one school in the country, Kangsan High School, Goo Se Ra, has a crush on Lee Seo Jun, who comes to Kangsan High School for teaching. She experiences all sorts of hardships with problem students. In order to protect her crush, Goo Se Ra decides to turn the worst problem school into a model school.

altTitles.ja: みゆちゃんはずっと友達

altTitles.en: Miyu-chan Will Always Be Your Friend

description.en: In the summer of his second year of high school, Yuushin Tahara finds that his childhood friend, Miyu Fukagawa, who had moved away, has returned to the house next door. Although Miyu has grown up to be quite cute, there's something a little strange about her...
description.es: En el verano de su segundo año de instituto, su amiga de la infancia Miyu Fukagawa vuelve a la casa de al lado del protagonista, Yuushin Tahara, después de haberse separado cuando se mudó. Miyu-chan ha crecido y se ha vuelto mucho más guapa, pero hay algo un poco extraño en ella...? Se trata de una comedia de suspenso y amor con una nueva sensación, en la que el demasiado amable protagonista y su simpática pero muy divertida amiga de la infancia ¡se desenvuelven con sus amigos!
description.ja: 高校2年生の夏、主人公・田原優心の隣の家に、引っ越しで別れてしまった幼馴染・深川みゆちゃんが帰ってきた。すっかり大きく可愛くなったみゆちゃんだけど、どこかちょっとヘンで…？
description.zh: 在高二夏天，主人公·田原优心与小学毕业时因搬家被迫分别的青梅竹马·深川美羽重逢了。虽然长大后的美羽变得很可爱，但是哪里有点奇怪……？过于温柔的主人公，与惹人喜爱却处处充满疑点的青梅竹马之间展开的新颖青春恋爱悬疑喜剧！
description.es-la: En el verano de su segundo año de instituto, su amiga de la infancia Miyu Fukagawa vuelve a la casa de al lado del protagonista, Yuushin Tahara, después de haberse separado cuando se mudó. Miyu-chan ha crecido y se ha vuelto mucho más guapa, pero hay algo un poco extraño en ella...? Se trata de una comedia de suspenso y amor con una nueva sensación, en la que el demasiado amable protagonista y su simpática pero muy divertida amiga de la infancia ¡se desenvuelven con sus amigos!
description.pt-br:
No verão do seu segundo ano do ensino médio, Tahara Yuushin descobre que sua amiga de infância, Fukagawa Miyu, que havia se mudado, retornou para a casa ao lado. Embora Miyu tenha se tornado uma garota bastante fofa, há algo um pouco estranho sobre ela...

Uma comédia romântica com toques de suspense, centrada em um protagonista gentil e sua amiga de infância adorável, porém um tanto excêntrica.

description.en: The question remains: Why should rapists and murderers be locked up in prison? Just as my wife suffered, shouldn’t they feel the same pain?" Former soldier turned assassin, Kim Taepil, brutally kills thugs responsible for raping women, transforming from a heroic figure to a ruthless killer overnight. Taepil, overwhelmed by helplessness, is visited by Representative Shin Jin-su, who offers him an unexpected proposal: ‘Become the punisher yourself.’" With the justice system corrupted, a group of ten government-sanctioned avengers seek to establish a new order by exacting vengeance outside the law.

title.en: Alma-chan wa Kazoku ni Naritai Z

altTitles.ja: アルマちゃんは家族になりたいZ

altTitles.ja-ro: Aruma-chan wa Kazoku ni Naritai Z

altTitles.en: Alma-chan Wants to Have a Family! Z

altTitles.zh: 小阿尔玛想要成为家人Z

description.en: Alma-chan (a super high-performance girl-type weapon), who loves her father and mother (both genius scientists), learns everyday to become the best and strongest robot in order to become stronger and live happily with her friends! A comedy Alma's family, friends, and enemies can't take their eyes off of her as she learns day by day, and she is always surrounded by a lot of people!

'Sejong's secret weapon, Shadow Unit informer.'
Gwiyoung, called the Ghost's Shadow, has been wandering around the battlefield since childhood.
Vowing to get revenge, he decided to become a member of the nation's best special forces as an informer.

altTitles.ja: ふぉとくら

description.en: Alcohol, skipping class, accidental groping... College student life is the best! Four men and women who belong to the photo club of the university in a fluffy comedy!
description.ja:
大学生たちは今日も授業に出ず、部室で酒を飲んでいた。そこになぜか高校の制服を着て、四条ゆきが現れる。ゆきは制服のままビールを飲もうとするが、ビールを福岡夏美にぶちまけ、夏美はブラ透けしてしまう。夏美は泣く泣く、ゆきが持ってきた中学の制服を着るはめになってしまった。

「ヘイ!　写真部ボーイズ。ひとつお願いあんだけど」

altTitles.ja: わたしにアイを教えて

description.es-la: En una escuela normal se encuentro nuestro protagonista quien esta enamorada de su amiga, pero que no puede encontrar la manera de llamar su atencion mas que molestandola de vez en cuando, pero con las motivaciones de sus amigas de poco a poco se acerca hasta que encuentra una oportunidad de confesarse, pero al momento de hacerlo todo se va al traste porque ahora esta dentro de un bucle y todo lo que hice un dia antes nunca ocurrio. Ahora el prota debe buscar la manera de salir de esto y a la vez confesar sus sentimientos. ¿Lo lograra?

title.en: Isekai Yurutto Survival Seikatsu ~Gakkou no Minna to Isekai no Mujintou ni Tenishitakedo Ore Dake Rakushou desu~

altTitles.ja: 異世界ゆるっとサバイバル生活 ～学校の皆と異世界の無人島に転移したけど俺だけ楽勝です～

altTitles.en: Survival Life in a Different World: I Moved to an Uninhabited Island in a Different World With Everyone at School, but I’m the Only One Who Wins Easily

altTitles.ko: 이세계 느긋 서바이벌 생활 ~학교 모두와 이세계의 무인도로 전이했지만 나만 낙승입니다~

altTitles.zh: 异世界悠闲荒野求生～和学校的众人一起传送到了无人岛但是只有我游刃有余～

altTitles.zh-hk: 異世界悠閒荒野求生~和學校的眾人一起傳送到了無人島但是僅自己遊刃有餘~

description.en:
I’m Shinomiya Hokage, a 3rd-year high-school boy who dreams of a survival life. One day, everyone in my school transferred to a mysterious island in a parallel world. I woke up in an unknown cave and I started moving on my own. Then, I met up with some of my classmates. My knowledge and tools in survival shines through. I was a plain guy in school but I’m the leader in this world.  
  


---
description.es:
Soy Shinomiya Hokage, un chico de tercer año de preparatoria que sueña con una vida de supervivencia. Un día, todos en mi escuela se trasladaron a una isla misteriosa en un mundo paralelo. Me desperté en una cueva desconocida y empecé a moverme por mi cuenta. Entonces, me encontré con algunos de mis compañeros de clase. Mis conocimientos y herramientas de supervivencia destacan. Yo era un chico sencillo en la escuela, pero soy el líder en este mundo.  
  


---
description.ja:
無人島暮らしを夢見る高校生、篠宮火影(しのみや ほかげ)は、クラスメートとともに異世界にある謎の島に転移する。
電気もガスも水道もない無人島で、火影は持ち前のサバイバル能力によって次々に問題を解決する。
嵐に見舞われても、虎に拠点を占領されても、火影が止まることはない。
卓越した知識と経験でゼロから文明を築く、ちょっぴりエッチな本格異世界サバイバルコメディ。
description.pt:
Eu sou Shinomiya Hokage, um garoto do terceiro ano do ensino médio que sonha com uma vida de sobrevivência. Um dia, todos na minha escola foram transferidos para uma ilha misteriosa em um mundo paralelo. Acordei em uma caverna desconhecida e comecei a explorar sozinho. Então, encontrei algumas das minhas colegas. Meu conhecimento e ferramentas de sobrevivência se destacam. Eu era um menino simples na escola, mas sou o líder neste mundo.  
  


---

**Monthly serialization / Serialización mensual.**  
  
- [Alternative Raw Source](https://rawmangas.net/manga/isekai-yurutto-survival-seikatsu-gakkou-no-minna-to-isekai-no-mujintou-ni-tenishitakedo-ore-dake-rakushou-desu-manga-raw/)
description.pt-br: Eu sou Shinomiya Hokage, um garoto do terceiro ano do ensino médio que sonha com uma vida de sobrevivência. Um dia, todos na minha escola foram transferidos para uma ilha misteriosa em um mundo paralelo. Acordei em uma caverna desconhecida e comecei a explorar sozinho. Então, encontrei algumas das minhas colegas. Meu conhecimento e ferramentas de sobrevivência se destacam. Eu era um menino simples na escola, mas sou o líder neste mundo.

title.en: Dungeon Tou de Yadoya wo Yarou! Souzou Mahou wo Moratta Ore no Hosoude Hanjouki

altTitles.ja: ダンジョン島で宿屋をやろう! 創造魔法を貰った俺の細腕繁盛記

altTitles.en: Let's run an inn on Dungeon Island! A Story of my Weak Selfs Success after receiving Creation Magic

altTitles.zh-hk: 在迷宮島上經營旅館吧！得到創造魔法之後我的成長記

altTitles.ja-ro: Dungeon Shima de Yadoya o Yarou! Sōzō Mahō o Moratta Ore no Hosoude Hanjō-ki

altTitles.zh: 在迷宫岛上经营旅馆吧！得到创造魔法之后我的成长记

altTitles.ko: 던전 섬에서 여관을 하자! 창조 마법을 받은 나의 가냘픈 번성기

description.en:
One day, Sanada Shirou, who works for a black company, is transported to another world. Using his "creation magic", an ability he gained when transported, he opens an inn and is supposed to lead a slow life, but this other world is a little strange?! It is a world where women are overwhelmingly dominant, where women do dangerous work and battle, and men are powerless and are protected! The daily life of entertaining (in many ways) the women of this other world begins...!

---
**Links:**
- [Web Novel](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/1177354055503576578)  (JP)

title.en: Ore no Choukyou Skill ga Nanka Hen

altTitles.ja: 俺の調教スキルがなんか変

altTitles.en: There's Something Wrong with My Training Skills

description.en:
Takashi, a beast tamer who can't use his training skill well, is constantly suffering rebellion by his beasts. However, on a particular occasion, his skill is activated! For some reason, the companion it worked on was a girl!? It's a beast taming x pitiful heroine erotic fantasy adventure!

(Source: Futabasha, translated)
description.zh: 无法顺利使用调教技能的御兽使阿隆，过着每天都被魔兽欺负的日子。但是在某个契机下他觉醒了自己的技能!为什么这个技能只对女孩子有效？！

altTitles.ja: レジスター

description.en: How young is too young to fall in love? How old is too old to fall in love? Who decides the end of the flowery days of youth and the beginning of the same? In the eastern part of Tokyo, at a supermarket in a town zero meters above sea level. A chance encounter for two people over the cashier's counter. A youth-returning story where something might start!
description.ja:
いくつまで恋が出来るのか。
いくつから恋が出来るのか。
青春の終わりを、始まりを、誰が決めるのか。
東京東部、
海抜ゼロメートルの町のスーパーマーケット。
レジカウンター越しの二人。
何かが始まるかもしれない青春リターナブル・ストーリー！
description.zh: 什么时候开始恋爱才好、什么时候结束恋爱才好。青春的序幕与尾曲又是什么人决定的呢？在东京的某处小商街里，有个恋爱故事在超市的收银台边拉开了序幕

description.en: Wang Dokpil, the boss of Jeolhwa, the largest organization in Chungcheong, and his son, Wang Dam. After his father’s death, Wang Dam has a different dream than inheriting his father’s organization and decides to head to Seoul on a whim. But life isn’t that simple, as he envisioned his uncle, who was a member of the organization, proposes a condition that if Wang Dam becomes No. 1 in his new school, he’ll receive a settlement allowance. However, Wang Dam’s new school, notoriously known as Ppak High, is infamous for school violence. Can Wang Dam become No. 1 in Ppak High School, the one full of the nation’s worst troublemakers?

title.en: Saikyou wa Inaka Nouka no Ossan Deshita ~Saikou Rank no Dragon o Kujo Shita Kekka, Jitsuryoku ga Sekai ni Baremashita~

altTitles.ja: 最強は田舎農家のおっさんでした～最高ランクのドラゴンを駆除した結果、実力が世界にバレました～

altTitles.ja-ro: Saikyou wa Inaka Nouka no Ossan deshita: Saikou Rank no Dragon wo Kujo shita Kekka, Jitsuryoku ga Sekai ni Baremashita

altTitles.en: A Middle-Aged Farmer in the Countryside Was the Strongest: The World Found Out His True Strength After He Exterminated the Highest Ranked Dragon
The Strongest Was a Country Farmer Old Man ~As a Result of Exterminating the Highest Rank Dragon, His Ability Was Revealed to the World~

description.en: The streaming guild that Goshu belonged to fired him and posted a video humiliating him to boost their followers. Disgraced, Goshu takes refuge in a small village where he starts streaming videos about farming. However, his peaceful life drastically changes when a dragon appears in the area. Goshu easily defeats the creature, but the incident is recorded and goes viral, causing a huge stir among his viewers.

After her parents died, Sami gave up her life of fortune to live independently, doing odd jobs to make ends meet. When she starts to get involved with two of the most popular boys at her high school, Sami faces twists and turns -- Chan is her neighbor, and Pyojun makes her have conflicted feelings. Things get more complicated when she finds out that Chan has feelings for Pyojun as well! With her mom’s only keepsake in hand to keep her feet on the ground, Sami navigates obstacles that she wasn’t prepared for -- and aren’t even in her budget!

title.en: 100 Ghost Stories That Will Lead to My Own Death

altTitles.ja: 僕が死ぬだけの百物語
Boku ga Shinu dake no Hyakumonogatari

altTitles.en: The Hundred Ghost Stories That Led to My Death
Hundred Ghost Stories of My Own Death
100 Ghost Stories That Will Lead to My Own Death

description.en:
One day, an elementary school child named Yuuma tries to jump out of his classroom window. His classmate Hina stops him and, in a bid to stall for time, asks him, “Do you know the round of a hundred ghost stories?” Hina tells Yuuma about a ritual where, if you tell a hundred ghost stories, you’ll see ghosts afterward. Learning this gives Yuuma a new lease on life. Chapter by chapter, he shares ghost stories with the reader, slowly but surely inching his way toward one hundred…

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
description.pt-br: Série de terror antológica detalhando a "Rodada das 100 Histórias de Fantasmas", muitas vezes usado como um teste de coragem, onde os participantes contam cem histórias sobrenaturais,  apagam uma vela e se olham no espelho depois de terminar cada história. Quando a centésima vela é apagada, diz-se que fantasmas e demônios são convocados ao nosso mundo. Um antigo conto popular originário do Japão recontado por de Yuuma, um menino que vive em uma casa problemática.

altTitles.ja: 俺は悪党ではありません

altTitles.ja-ro: Ore wa Akutou de wa Arimasen

description.en:
Cain von Euclid, grandson of the First King who unified the First Continent, learns from his respected grandfather that he is destined to become the strongest villain. Being unable to kill his grandson, the grandfather takes Cain on a journey to make him strong enough to overcome his fate. 

For 13 years, they travel across the Second, Third, and the Fourth Continent, where Cain achieved tremendous power. Finally, Cain sets off on a lone adventure where he meets many people who influence him. 

Will he be able to defy destiny and avoid becoming a villain?

altTitles.ja: サーシャちゃんとクラスメイトオタクくん
Саша и ее одноклассник Отаку

altTitles.es-la: La chica de secundaria Sasha-chan y su compañero de clases Otaku-kun

altTitles.vi: Bé sơ trung Sasha và thằng bạn Otaku cùng lớp

description.en:
I am an aspiring mangaka, currently assisting in the production of erotic doujinshi as a middle school student. While I was reading doujinshi at school, a beautiful girl very interested in erotic things, Sasha-san, suddenly called me “Master”!?

The story of a beautiful, cheerful girl volunteering to be my ecchi disciple.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/57098)
description.fr:
Fujiwara est un mangaka amateur, il dessine des mangas érotiques alors qu’il n’est que collégien. Tandis qu'il lisait un porno à l'école, une jolie fille nommée Sasha qui s’avère être très intéressée par ces choses, et lui adresse la parole, elle se met même à l’appeler "Maître" !? 

  C’est l'histoire d'une belle et joyeuse fille qui se porte volontaire pour être mon disciple dans la perversion.
description.ja: 僕は未来の大漫画家にして現えっちな同人誌アシの中学生。学校で同人誌を読んでいたら、えっち方面に興味津々の美少女、サーシャさんから「ししょー」と呼ばれ‥‥!?
description.es-la: Sin importarle el qué dirán y sin temor a caer en lo más bajo de la escala social dentro de la escuela, Otaku-kun no oculta su gran afición por los mangas para adultos, cosa que le hace ganarse el rechazo de su salón apenas en el primer día de clases; sin embargo, Sasha, lejos de sentir aberración por su afición, muestra un interés peculiar, iniciando así una relación... ¡¿mentor-alumna?!

title.en: S-Kyuu Boukensha ga Ayumu Michi: Tsuihou Sareta Shounen wa Shin no Nouryoku 'Buki Master' de Sekai Saikyou ni Itaru

altTitles.en: The Path of an S-Class Adventurer: The Exiled Boy Becomes the World's Strongest With His True Ability, "Weapon Master"

altTitles.ja-ro: S-Class Boukensha ga Ayumu Michi ~Tsuihou Sareta Shounen wa Shin no Nouryoku "Buki Master" de Sekai Saikyou ni Itaru~

altTitles.vi: Sau Khi Bị Trục Xuất, Tôi Trở Thành Mạnh Nhất Thế Giới Với Chúc Phúc "Bậc Thầy Vũ Khí"

altTitles.ja: Ｓ級冒険者が歩む道　 ～追放された少年は真の能力『武器マスター』で世界最強に至る～

altTitles.vi: Hành trình của mạo hiểm giả rank S: Tôi trở thành mạnh nhất thế giới với chúc phúc “Weapon Master”

altTitles.es-la: El Camino del Aventurero de Rango S: El Joven Exiliado se convierte en el más fuerte del mundo con su verdadera habilidad como "Maestro de armas".

description.en: Haise is a young boy who has been gifted with an unknown ability. He becomes an adventurer together with his childhood friend Sasha, but is kicked out of the team for being unable to use his ability and being a hindrance. Furthermore, while continuing his solo adventure, he is caught in a trap and falls into dire straits. Just as he is on the brink of death, Haise's ability "Weapon Master" awakens! It is a power that shakes the laws of the world, summoning weapons from another world! ? An unrivaled fantasy set in another world that begins with adversity!
description.ja: 詳細不明の能力を授けられた少年ハイセ。 彼は幼馴染のサーシャとともに冒険者になるも、能力が扱えず足手まといだとチームから追放されてしまう。 さらに一人冒険者を続ける最中、罠に嵌められて絶体絶命の危機に陥ることに。 死の淵に立たされたその時、ハイセの能力『武器マスター』が目を覚ます！ それは異世界の武器を喚び出すという世界の理をも揺るがす力で！？ 逆境から始まる、異世界無双ファンタジー開幕！

altTitles.ja: シャイ

description.en: In the middle of the 21st century, the world was on the brink of World War III. But superheroes from across the globe appeared and helped bring an era of peace. With the crisis averted, the Heroes returned to their home countries where they now help with domestic matters. This is the story about the young Japanese heroine named "Shy"…
description.fr:
Au milieu du XXIe siècle, le monde était au bord de la troisième guerre mondiale. Mais des super-héros du monde entier sont apparus et ont contribué à l'avènement d'une ère de paix. La crise ayant été évitée, les Héros sont retournés dans leur pays d'origine où ils apportent désormais leur aide pour les affaires intérieures. C'est l'histoire de la jeune héroïne japonaise nommée « Shy »…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.id: Di pertengahan abad ke-21, dunia berada di ambang Perang Dunia ke III. Tapi pahlawan super dari seluruh dunia muncul dan membantu membawa era perdamaian. Bersamaan menghindari krisis, para Pahlawan kembali ke negara asal mereka di mana mereka sekarang membantu masalah-masalah dalam negerinya. Ini adalah kisah tentang pahlawan muda dari Jepang bernama "Shy"…
description.pt: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada "Shy"…
description.ru: В середине 21-го века мир был на гране третьей мировой войны. Но супер герои, появившиеся по всему миру, помогли принести в мир покой. Разобравшись с этим, герои вернулись в свои страны, где теперь помогают с местными проблемами. Эта же история о японской героини “Стесняшка”…
description.th: ในช่วงกลางศตวรรษที่ 21 โลกได้ตกอยู่ในยุคของสงครามโลกครั้งที่สาม แต่แล้วได้มีฮีโร่ปรากฏตัวขึ้นจากทั่วโลก และช่วยนำพายุคแห่งสันติภาพกลับคืนมา หลังจากวิกฤตได้ผ่านพ้นไป ฮีโร่แต่ละคนได้กลับไปยังประเทศบ้านเกิดของพวกเขา เพื่อช่วยเหลือภัยพิบัติที่เกิดขึ้นในของแต่ละประเทศของตัวเอง …นี่คือเรื่องราวเกี่ยวกับ สาวน้อยฮีโร่ชาวญี่ปุ่น ที่มีนามว่า "ฌาย"…
description.tr:
21. yüzyılın ortasında, dünya III. Dünya Savaşının eşiğindeydi. Süper kahramanlar dünyanın çeşitli yerlerinde ortaya çıktı ve barış çağını getirmeye yardımcı oldular. Kriz önlendiği için tüm kahramanlar kendi ülkelerine döndü ve iç meselelere yardım etmeye başladılar. Bu "SHY" adlı Japon Kadın Kahramanının hikayesi…?  


---

 Author's Twitter: [@bukimi397](https://twitter.com/bukimi397)
description.vi:
Vào giữa thế kỷ 21, trong số các anh hùng có mặt khắp nơi trên khắp thế giới xuất hiện một anh hùng siêu xấu hổ đến từ Nhật Bản với biệt danh là "Shy".
Cô gánh trên mình trách nhiệm của một anh hùng, mặc dù bản thân rất kém trong việc đối mặt với ánh mắt đến từ mọi người.
Dù gặp biết bao gian khó và khổ đau, nhưng Shy vẫn đứng lên vì những người xung quanh...! 
Không chỉ dừng ở những cuộc xung đột, SHY còn là câu chuyện về tình người, về sự đồng tâm hiệp lực của các anh hùng để cùng nhau tiến về phía trước!
Câu chuyện trưởng thành về anh hùng mang tấm lòng nhân ái!
description.es-la: A mediados del siglo 21, el mundo estaba al borde de la 3ra Guerra Mundial. Sin embargo, alrededor del mundo, héroes comenzaron a aparecer y ayudaron a traer la paz a esta era. Con esa crisis habiendo sido evitada, los héroes regresaron a sus paises de origen donde ahora ayudan con asuntos internos. Esta historia se trata de la joven heroína japonesa llamada "Shy"…
description.pt-br: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada “Shy”...

altTitles.ja: 獣王と薬草

description.en: Dungeons are the stuff of dreams—defeat the monsters, take their loot, and then venture into uncharted territory to discover hidden riches! Tina, an upstart adventurer with just such a dream, ends up mortally wounded while exploring a dungeon. Suddenly, the great demon known as the Beast King Garon, who was supposed to have been slain by a hero in the distant past, appears before her!  Dungeon fantasy meets medical drama!
description.ru:
Подземелья - это воплощение мечты…
Собирайте материалы с поверженных монстров,
добирайтесь до неисследованных мест и завладевайте сокровищами!
Тина, авантюристка, мечтает о таком успехе,
Исследуя подземелье, она получает тяжелое ранение.
Перед ней появляется сильнейший демон «Король зверей Гарон», когда-то в прошлом он должен был быть убит героем?..

Фэнтези и медицинская драма по мотивам подземелья от Konda Tatsukazu, автора оригинальной истории «Ginrou Bloodborne/Серебряный волк, рожденный в крови», начинается!

title.en: Weile Fuhuo Anlian De Shi Zun Wo Bei Po Kaile Hougong

altTitles.zh: 为了复活暗恋的师尊我被迫开了后宫

altTitles.zh-ro: Wèile Fùhuó Ànliàn De Shī Zūn Wǒ Bèi Pò Kāile Hòugōng

altTitles.en: I Was Forced to Open a Harem to Resurrect the Master I Had a Crush on

description.zh: 花樱樱一朝穿成小孤女，命悬一线之时，天降仙女师尊，救她于水火。 于是花樱樱日日撩夜夜追，终于舔化冰山，只等师尊渡劫成功就能双宿双修，双宿双飞…… 谁成想师尊居然渡劫失败，碎成了渣渣！ 为了复活师尊，花樱樱穿梭七重镜界，要和七个不同身份的切片师尊酱酱酿酿，水乳交融！ 花樱樱捏拳，无奈道：开后宫什么的，都是为了拯救师尊呐！

description.en:
Blue Archive GLB's official 4-Koma, featuring snippets of the daily occurrences in Kivotos!

For the Official English and Korean versions, you can find them on the respective server's Twitter account.

The series is titled (Global) to differentiate it from the Japanese 4-Koma.

---
**Links:**
- [Blue Archive EN's Twitter](https://twitter.com/EN_BlueArchive)
- [Blue Archive KR's Twitter](https://twitter.com/KR_BlueArchive)
- [JP Server's 4-Koma](https://mangadex.org/title/1f63ea84-6bc6-4312-81bf-b28d5592d802/blue-archive-japan)

title.en: Yoku Wakaranai Keredo Isekai ni Tensei Shiteita You Desu

altTitles.ja: よくわからないけれど異世界に転生していたようです

altTitles.en: This is Screwed Up, but I was Reincarnated as a GIRL in Another World!

altTitles.zh-hk: 雖然不太清楚，不過我好像轉生到異世界了

altTitles.id: Saya tidak begitu mengerti, tapi sepertinya saya bereinkarnasi di dunia lain

altTitles.vi: Chuyển Sinh Thành Con Gái, Tôi Sẽ Sinh Tồn Tại Dị Giới

altTitles.en: I Don't Really Get It, but It Looks like I Was Reincarnated in Another World

description.en:
Ren, a young orphan girl, has been sold off to a merchant with sinister plans for her. Suddenly, memories of her past life on a world called Earth come flooding back, and Ren remembers that she used to be a research scientist – and a grown man! As Ren escapes into the Dark Forest, magical powers awaken within her. In order to survive the harsh realities of this world, she must use her rekindled knowledge of Earth's science as well as her newfound powers! Will her magical cheat powers and past-life knowledge be enough to keep her freedom, or is she doomed to a life of servitude?
___
**Character Designer:** [Kaoming](https://mangadex.org/author/259d2f17-2e24-4346-aca8-1ecd2224c491)
description.ja:
「私、おっさんだった！！」

孤児の少女・レンは身売りされる途中で、前世の記憶を取り戻す。レンの前世は、三十代の男性研究者だったが、転生して今まで孤児として生きていたのであった。レンは、その身に秘められた魔法の才能と、前世の科学的知識を駆使して、ひとり過酷な異世界を生き抜いていく。

title.en: BanG Dream! It's MyGO!!!!! Ame ni Soyoide Hare wo Kou

altTitles.ja: BanG Dream! It's MyGO!!!!! 雨にそよいで晴れを請う

altTitles.en: BanG Dream! It's MyGO!!!!! Swaying in the Rain, Looking for the Sunshine

altTitles.zh: BanG Dream! It's MyGO!!!!! 雨中祈晴

altTitles.id: BanG Dream! It's MyGO!!!!! Terayun di Bawah Derasnya Hujan, Menanti Mentari

description.en:
I believed it was destiny that brought us together. It's my irreplaceable home, warm like spring sunshine. Therefore... Here is the newly depicted story of the lost girls from the TV anime "BanG Dream! It's MyGO!!!!!". 

(from Comic Growl)
description.id:
Aku percaya takdirlah yang akan mempertemukan kita. Inilah rumahku yang tak tergantikan, rasanya hangat seperti sinar mentari di musim semi.

Ini adalah kisah tentang gadis-gadis yang tersesat dari anime televisi "BanG Dream! It's MyGO!!!!!".

(dari Comic Growl)

description.en:
"I wanted to create a summery, sparkling youth." - And so the theme is "yosakoi*"!!  
  
For the sake of her younger sister's medical treatment, Natsume moves from her home in Tokyo to Shikoku. In a place where no one knows her, she decides to make her high school debut as a "cool beauty"! …This determined Natsume is approached by the wild child-like Yudai saying, "Join my team"??  
  
Eeh!!? What do you mean by team!!?

altTitles.ja: 新ルパン三世

description.en:
Lupin the Third and his motley crew return in Shin Lupin III! This time, several of the stories are either brand new or adapted from or to the Lupin anime, and the beginning story was even animated by itself several years later!  
  
Lupin the Third is the grandson of the famous literary thief Arsène Lupin, and his partners in crime include the sharpshooter Jigen Daisuke, the stoic samurai Goemon Ishikawa the Thirteenth, and the on-again-off-again lover/enemy Fujiko Mine. Their goal is to outwit enemies bigger than themselves while nabbing the world's rarest and most important items, while also outwitting the dogged Inspector Zenigata, who's made it his life's work to capture and secure Lupin. In the manga however, his relationship with the titular thief isn't as "respecting to the enemy" as you would expect, as he's attempted multiple times to kill him without shedding a tear!   
  
What kind of sexy exploits will Lupin and his crew get up to next in…Shin Lupin III!

altTitles.ja: 吸血姫【ヴァンパイア】美夕 朔
吸血姫美夕 朔

description.en: A half-human, half-vampire girl named Miyu is trapped in a body that will remain a teenager forever. As a vampire, it is her duty to hunt down demonic beings known as Shinma who have wandered into the human world and send them back to the Darkness. The new story begins with Miyu transferring to a certain middle school.

title.en: Yuri Yuri Panic ~Toutosugiru Jian ga Hasseishiteimasu!~

altTitles.ja: ゆりゆりぱにっく～尊すぎる事案が発生しています！～

altTitles.en: Yuri Yuri Panic: An Extremely Precious Affair has Begun

description.en: The most beautiful girl in my class proposes to me, a loner?! On her first day at school, Akari, a plain high school girl, suddenly receives a marriage registration form from the conspicuous Kiyozumi Runa...? A girl-meets-girl school romantic comedy where a girl and her yuri-brained imaginary friend Omochi get caught up in a precious affair!!

title.en: Kaisha no Kouhai ga Mahoutsukai datta

altTitles.ja: 会社の後輩が魔法使いだった

altTitles.en: My Junior at the Company Was a Witch

altTitles.ja: 穢れのない人

description.en:
Ichiro Akitaka, framed for a crime most heinous—child molestation and murder. 
Engulfed by despair and contemplating the final release of suicide, he is pulled back from the brink by the young, earnest priest, Kiba.
Despite the sordid label society had pinned to him, Kiba shows Akitaka an unending mercy and kindness.

A life of peace he'd yearned for, days unmarred by reproach.
But could such salvation truly exist in this place?

altTitles.ja: ハルのレジスタ

description.en:
Once hailed as a soccer prodigy, high school girl Arai Haru transferred to a school far from her hometown, hoping to start a new life away from soccer. However, a new student, Osanai Satsuki, who admired Haru's past glory, appeared before her and declared her intention to join the Soccer Club, which is on the verge of disbandment. This is a girls' soccer story about a girl who gave up her dream and a girl who chases after it!
___
**What is a regista?**
The regista is a creative player who operates in front of the defense, almost always in a central position, and looks to get on the ball as often as possible. They are responsible for providing the link between defense and offense, and controlling the tempo of the game through their passing. The regista is also known as the deep-lying playmaker: they retain their deep position and dictate their team's play with their distribution. ([Coaches' Voice](https://www.coachesvoice.com/cv/what-is-a-regista-explained-jorginho-andrea-pirlo/))
description.ja: かつて天才サッカー少女と呼ばれた女子高生、荒井 華は地元を離れ、サッカーから距離を置いた生活を送っていた。しかしそんな彼女にあこがれる少女、小山内 皐と出会い、華は再びサッカーと向き合うこととなる。

altTitles.ja-ro: Harukawa-san wa kyō mo uete iru

altTitles.ja: 春川さんは今日も飢えている

description.en:
Meet Natsumi Harukawa, a young office lady. During work, she is asocial and constantly looks cranky. However, the truth is that Harukawa-san is simply very hungry, and spends her time after work eating delicious foods.   
  
Artist’s Twitter: <https://twitter.com/oriharasachiko>

title.en: Kami Chi no Kyuuseishu -0.00000001% o Hikiate Saikyou e-

altTitles.ja: 神血の救世主〜0.00000001%を引き当て最強へ〜

altTitles.en: Savior of Divine Blood: Draw Out 0.00000001% to Become the Strongest

description.en: A player who can fight creatures from the wonders of another world. The main protagonist, Ariake Subaru, was bullied and was chosen as a player of the “Rainbow” rank, which is neither gold, silver, nor copper. He acquired the skill to freely manipulate blood, and his life and position changed completely. As he continues to fight every day, he gradually earns the title as a “Savior” who will save the world.
description.ja: 異界からの脅威に対抗する超人的存在"プレイヤー"。イジメられっ子の透晴は、既存の金・銀・銅のどれでもない、"虹"ランクのプレイヤーに選ばれる。それまでの立ち位置から一変、世界を救う"救世主"となる！
